title: league of legends
body:
i cant download league of legends i have a account i buy a new computer and it doesent works 

Can u guys help  me

replies.body: New computers or outdated versions of windows can certainly have installation errors.  Without too much context, I'm guessing you're having the error requiring additional products like [visual C++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Downloading that manually could help, but I recommend making sure your drivers and pc are up to date!  Hope that helps!
